Jumbo was the grandfather of my wife Melissa, and over the past few years I have been working my way through the family archives uncovering a life that was far less than ordinary. With your help and support ‘Water’s Gleaming Gold’ will bring this story to life through publication of the hardback. I will be writing the book, designing the layout and employing an experienced editor to assist me in this task and publishing the book under the Lapwing Publishing imprint. The text will be accompanied by over 20 illustrations that have not been seen before and reflecting Jumbo's exploits at Henley, the Los Angeles Olympics, his wartime career in Coastal Command, and as an innovative rowing coach.“With the death of Group Captain HRA 'Jumbo' Edwards, rowing loses one of its most colourful and famous personalities. He will be remembered as not only one of the greatest oarsman of all time, but also as a famous coach, innovator and raconteur. His race record could only be described as phenomenal. British rowing owes more to Jumbo Edwards than any other person in the sport as far as attention to the science of boat moving is concerned.”The Times, Obituary, December 1972 “As an 8-year-old after seeing the Henley race against the Germans in 1931, I knew we should win the Second World War and that Jumbo Edwards would play a part”.Sir Charles Wheeler, Journalist and Broadcaster THE STORYIn the Boat Race of 1926, at the age of 19, Hugh ‘Jumbo’ Edwards rowed for Oxford alongside his brother. Edwards collapsed when the Dark Blues held a slight lead and Cambridge went on to win. From this nadir, Edwards defied doctor’s orders and the British press on a mission to prove everyone wrong, and rise to the heights of success in the 1932 Los Angeles Olympics by winning two rowing gold medals on the same day. In 1943 his rowing ability saved his life. After protecting a convoy and attacking German U-Boats, Edwards ditched his damaged Liberator in the Atlantic Ocean. The only survivor of the air crew, and suffering from life-threatening injuries, he managed to row his dinghy overnight towards land and was picked up by a British minesweeper. After many wartime exploits and decorations, Group Captain Edwards retired from the RAF in 1946 and soon developed a reputation as an innovative rowing coach. Jumbo coached Oxford between 1949 and 1972, winning five boat races and surviving an infamous rebellion. In 1960 he coached the British rowing team at the Rome Olympic Games. ‘Water’s Gleaming Gold’ is the tale of a unique man on an extraordinary journey – from the humiliation of the Boat Race to the ultimate glory of twice winning gold at the Olympics. From establishing himself as a well-known air racing pilot in the 1930s to rising to the rank of Wing Commander in the RAF and battling U-Boats in the Atlantic Ocean. PUBLISHED ARTICLESI am a contributor to Hear the Boat Sing, a website dedicated to rowing, and these are links to a selection of articles on Jumbo:90 Years Ago, a HRR Triple Win for Jumbo Edwards. Jumbo Edwards: Oarsman, Coach and RAF Pilot THE PODCASTListen to me talking to Dan Snow (Historian and Broadcaster) about the life of Jumbo Edwards and my research into the book. Listen at 20 mins onwards.Dan Snow's History Hit: Britain's Forgotten Olympic Heroes THE BUDGETAll the funds contributed to this campaign will go towards the writing, editing, printing, publication, marketing and book launch for ‘Water’s Gleaming Gold’.  What happens if I get more than I ask for?Additional funds will help towards allowing the family to digitise the extensive Jumbo Edwards archive (letters, diaries, rowing reports, coaching strategies, photographs, flying logbooks) and make this available to the public, museums and rowing organisations.  TIMELINEThe research for the book is now complete and the writing process will commence at the end of Summer 2021. The book will be ready for editing in early 2022 with a scheduled publication date of June 2022. STAY IN TOUCHLearn more about the project and get updates on Twitter (@gmbjamieson) and my website, lapwingpublishing.com. FAQPlease do not hesitate to contact me with any queries. Thank you for your interest.

story:
Each month, Mexico’s extensive rail network unwillingly serves thousands of undocumented people from across Latin America and beyond. Apart from walking, this dangerous method of transportation is the only free ticket north for the passengers who are attempting to reach the United States. As La Bestia slowly traverses Mexico’s rugged landscape, these passengers are exposed to the subterranean environment of Mexico’s criminal and cartel underworld, often referred to as the ‘Cachuco’ industry - an illicit market that aims to profit from migrants in any way possible…
 

Juan's story:

"Juan first travelled alone from rural Guatemala to the United States in 1999 at the age of 14. To date, he has made the journey between the two countries six times. On his numerous rides atop La Bestia, he has witnessed other migrants lose limbs or fall to their death. He has been kidnapped, extorted and robbed by local gangs, drug cartels and even the police. A little over a year ago, he was pulled over on his way home from work at a fast food restaurant in Oklahoma, where his wife, sister and two children also live. The police officer asked Juan, “do you know why I pulled you over? Because you’re brown. I don’t like brown people”. Not being able to produce any documentation, he was deported after being held for months in an ICE detention facility. He will likely never be able to reunite with his family north of the border; but after twenty years in the US, he has nothing to return to in Guatemala either."

 

The book:

‘Sueño Americano’ is a short book (in A5) which explores personal stories and the greater political and historical implications of the Latin American migrant trail in Mexico to the US. More specifically, the book examines migration which utilises Mexico's extensive and dangerous freight train network, referred to simply as ‘La Bestia’ (The Beast), where up to 20,000 migrants are kidnapped each year, traversing some of the most violent regions in the world. Find the detailed description of the contents below.

Almost all of the groundwork for the book is complete and with your backing, we can afford the upfront costs to print, distribute and advertise Sueño Americano on this pre-order basis, as well as pay the contributors for their work prior to shipping.

The film:

Also, as featured at the top of this fundraiser, a short film is being produced in conjunction with the booklet which will not be available publicly, but will be made available for backers of the book, and serves now as a video trailer for the Sueño Americano project as a whole. The final film will be between 15-20 minutes in length.

Our mission:

30% of all net proceeds will be donated to 14 individual charities and critical groups working to protect children separated from their families by ICE (U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement). Between October 2018 and September 2019, the journeys of 72,873 unaccompanied children ended with apprehension at the U.S. southwest border (UNICEF USA). For more information on the individual charities, click here.  A further 10% of the net proceeds will be donated to ‘Medicines Sans Frontières’ (Doctors Without Borders) for their humanitarian work with migrants and vulnerable people worldwide during this global pandemic, which has stretched medical resources further than any other period in recent history. 

  • Why would you be interested in Sueño Americano?

To answer this question, we would like to borrow the words of the Salvadoran journalist and writer Óscar Martínez:

“My proposal is that you know what is going on. What [people who are migrating to the US] are living through. Because I believe that knowing is different from not knowing. I believe that knowing … is the beginning of the solution. I believe, sticking with the metaphor of the sea [that erodes] the rock, that knowing is what moves the waves. You can be one of the waves.”

I have invested many thousands of pounds into this project, excluding costs of equipment and labour time. We are not concerned with recouping this investment through the book, we merely wish to meet our expenses and generate funds for the aforementioned organisations, while raising awareness of migration in Mexico in a holistic context. There is a notable lack of media coverage for Latin American migration in the UK and Europe, which was one of the original motivations for this project. 

History of the project: 

Between the physical dangers of La Bestia, Mexico’s widespread criminal activity, and global quarantines, it has been a significant challenge to bring this project to life, which is the culmination of two years of first-hand research and four trips to the United States and Mexico. I am extremely grateful for the hospitality I recieved from strangers and friends alike in Mexico, Along with the input of my many collaborators, without whom, this project would not be possible. In the process of compiling a guide with rail information to help people travel on La Bestia, one of my collaborators was unfortunately kidnapped by the cartel in Nuevo Laredo, Mexico. He survived and was returned to the US after this event, but this illustrates the risks anyone takes to get a glimpse of the world of Mexico’s most vulnerable. 

Despite global lockdowns, I was able to continue the research for this book, utilising the connections I had already made in Mexico and Central America. I am now conducting phone interviews from the UK to be able to finish the research for this project to the fullest extent. 

Contents:

Part 1 - History and Context:

Initially, Sueño Americano will contain a historical and socio-political exploration of the migration of many Latin Americans through Mexico to the USA. This historical analysis will begin in the late 1800s, examining the United States involvement within Mexican economics and the Mexican revolution of 1910, as well as the creation of the Mexican rail network and its utilisation by US corporations operating in Latin America. 

Continuing, the book will examine a series of complex US foreign policy-based decisions utilising disclosed government branch documents. This will begin with an analysis of the ‘Monroe Doctrine’ and its use in the ending of European colonial rule in Mexico, and how this doctrine was later repurposed to give the US more control over the economies and resources of Latin America. The book then explores the “Red Scare” era of American foreign policy after the Cuban revolution, and its attempts to quell the growth of socialism and communism in Latin America by any means necessary. This was to attempt to sustain the United States field of influence in the region over other political forces under the administrations of presidents ranging from Eisenhower to Clinton, as well as the involvements of Henry Kissinger and the lobbying of private companies.

In-depth case studies will be conducted showing CIA-led interventions in states with democratically elected socialist politicians to curb the spread of the ideology, by funding and often training many paramilitary right-wing groups which conducted mass killings and attempted forms of ethnic cleansing. This, in effect, will showcase how the destabilisation and suppression bred the perfect environment for illicit trade, the rise of the cartels, and the formation of the powerful gangs in the US which now control Central America and beyond, sustaining the mass Latin-American migration to the US of the past 60 years. 

Part 2 - Today’s Politics and Fieldwork:

The second part of Sueño Americano will explore today's physical and political situation in Mexico, Central America and the US regarding migration. The book will examine recent policy making and political attitudes relating to migrants in Mexico and the US, as well as utilising extensive research and statistical data to highlight the situations and dangers for migrants while travelling across Mexico. The psychological implications of this journey will then be examined using case studies and original interviews by our collaborator in Chihuahua Mexico. Detailed accounts will be told of the journey and risks of La Bestia, interactions with police and criminal organisations, kidnappings, detentions by US police and help from Mexican organisations and individuals. Not only this, but personal accounts will be shared exploring the reasons that prompted migrants to leave their countries of origin in search of asylum. 

Part 3 - Personal Experiences:

As well as what is already mentioned, the final part of the book will give some brief insight into my personal journey and motivations for undertaking this fieldwork, from the first time I rode a freight train at the age of 17, until my latest trip to Mexico. We will explore some more detailed illustrated stories of my 100’s of hours of travel on La Bestia, as well as friends' and collaborators' stories of their own experiences travelling and riding freight trains in Mexico.

 

Final Points:

All text and research will be fully referenced, and resources for additional reading/viewing will also be included at the end, as well as a list of the charities we will donate to and a brief description of their work. Ultimately, Sueño Americano aims to serve both the casual reader with an interest in global migration and/or US/Mexico politics, and also provide a more holistic picture of why migration to the US exists in the way it does today for a more informed reader of the subject. 

Illustrations, Objects and Photos:

All of this will be supported by a powerful collection of illustrations and photos from various authors, as well as stills from the film to represent the people interviewed in the fieldwork, as well as other situations that are discussed in the text. There will also be a series of photographs of physical objects collected by myself or others during the fieldwork as pictured below.

Some Context Regarding Migration in Mexico (click for more info)

Timeline:

Below is the estimated timeline for the project development and production. We aim to print the first batch in November 2020, however, the timing is subject to changes in case of new lockdown/social distancing measures that might affect the production times.

 

Contributors:

Content creation:

Mouse Green is an artist based in London, UK, who works with analogue and digital video, as well as photography and installation. He has previously shown work at the Shanghai Biennale and British Library. He graduated with a first-class honours degree in Fine Art from Central Saint Martins. Current project 'Sueño Americano' was partially sponsored by the Mead Fellowship.

Ario Daniso is a researcher based in London, originating from Iran and Italy. He is a native speaker of Farsi and Italian, with English as an acquired mother tongue, and fluency in French and Spanish. He specialises in the analysis of left-wing movements and human rights issues. He has worked with NGOs such as Migrants Organise. Ario holds an undergraduate and Masters in International Relations, as well as a postgraduate degree in international human resource management and has published works including ‘Rojava, An Anarchist Utopia?’.

Ayur Sandoval is a researcher based in Chihuahua, Mexico, who graduated in psychology and is a currently working towards completing a master's degree in legal psychology from the Sigmund Freud faculty of psychology in Chihuahua City, Mexico. He has previously worked as a librarian at the aforementioned university, and as a facilitator at the Civil Association Centre for Family Intelligence, which serves troubled teens.  

Owen Ekert is a YouTuber and blogger who runs the channel entitled 'Ranoutonarail'. Over the past two years, he has documented his experience of riding more than 50 freight trains across Mexico.

Trailer voiceover performed by Yaatzil Ceballos Fernandez. 

Special thanks to: 

  • Cindy Gainza as the project's first fixer;
  • Erick 'Ranchero' Alvarado de la Fuente as the project's second fixer and extra support; 
  • Owen Ekert for field support and collaboration, as well as the inspiration to start this project;
  • Sara Nuñez Herreros for networking support and connecting me with locals;
  • Karen Fraenkel for additional translation support.

Design & book production:

Aziza Kadyri: producer, production manager and editor azizakadyri.co.uk

Dain Jeong: illustrations instagram.com/dain.arts 

Sharine Chan: typography sharinechan.cargo.site

Short Summary

Riley and Milo: A puppy’s story coping with grief and loss

Processing death with a child is not an easy task. In fact, many people find it overwhelming and do not know how to initiate the conversation with young children. Using books, or bibliotherapy, as a method of explaining loss and grief is an effective tool for complex conversations. The book Riley and Milo leads young readers through the stages of grief such as: denial, anger, bargaining, sadness and acceptance. As the puppy Riley is processing the death of her best friend Milo, she explains her feelings and the impact of Milo’s death on her life. This book was created to help naturalize the emotions and experiences of young readers who are coping with grief and loss.

 

Meet the Author

Cassie L. D’Addeo, is a licensed Marriage and Family Therapist and Certified School Counselor residing in Manatee County, Florida. When moving to Florida three years ago, Cassie opened Green Couch Counseling, LLC a private counseling practice servicing children, adolescents and adults. Cassie has a passion for helping people and dedicated her life work to assisting people through life’s most difficult challenges.

This book was created as a graduate school project while completing an internship with Broward County Public Schools. In January 2010 prior to graduation, the earthquake in Haiti occurred bringing hundreds of children from Haiti to the Fort Lauderdale area. Many young children were experiencing extreme loss and grief from the aftermath of the earthquake. Cassie used bibliotherapy as a means of communicating and processing grief with the children. At this time, the first draft of the manuscript was created. Cassie graduated Nova Southeastern University with a masters degree in Marriage and Family Therapy and went on to provide clinical services in outpatient, residential, home-based, and in the school setting.

In May 2020, Cassie experienced her own loss, after tragically losing her canine companion, Riley. Riley was born in Wisconsin, May 2013, and started training to be a clinical therapy dog at eight weeks old. Within her first year of life, Riley completed her training, certification and her clinical internship with Youth and Family Counseling in Libertyville, Illinois. Riley served many years as Cassie's co-therapist.  In the Fall of 2020, Cassie’s mom suggested that she finish the project she started 10 years ago in honor of her canine co-therapist, Riley. After revisions and name changes, the final manuscript was completed. Riley and Milo: A puppy’s story of coping with grief and loss is Cassie's first children's book publication. 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with Richter Publishing, LLC. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for marketing and publishing costs of my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in the Spring of 2021.
  • The cover design of my book.
  • The layout design for the interior of my book
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this coming Spring 2021.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • A personally signed copy of my children’s book when published.
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with Richter Publishing, LLC to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram with your friends, family and network. Please use #GreenCouchCounseling and tag me as well as my publisher, Richter Publishing, LLC, so we can help amplify our efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Respectfully,

Cassie L. D’Addeo, LMFT

story:
The work

Somewhere in America there was a quaint little town called Jamestown. It was normal enough for a while, then something happened.
Owen was just a normal teenage boy before he took the pill, the one that gave him psychic powers he never imagined. He couldn't know the things he does now — how could he? 
With the government investigating his every move he finds himself in a world any other normal high school boy would never have found himself in.
Bio
I am a debut author from Michigan. I have always had a love of reading, and writing has interested me from a young age. I appreciate being able to share my work of many years with you. You can find me on Twitter tweeting about my upcoming work. (@BlaketGardner)

story:
Ireland Today is a news website with a difference.  Our readership are integral to us.  We are inclusive and want to get to the root of the problems and successes in Irish society today, focusing on the ordinary people who make this country what it is.

Our ethos is to cover the news the mainstream media is missing, with talented journalists who are keen to focus in on issue-based journalism which will give our readers the message that we are indeed on their side.  

The editor and owner of Ireland Today has more than 10 years experience working on national newspapers and she has seen gaps in reporting over the years.  Mainstream news often focuses on the rich, the powerful and has started once again to highlight expensive property, as an aspiration towards what people should want, directly after the biggest property bust this country has witnessed, leaving many weighed down with debt for generations.  

Our readership will have a voice and we will reflect it in what we write.

As well as being an ethical news site, we want to continue our ethos in who we are as a team.  So far, we are small, but we want to build upon this and hire not only experienced journalists, but trainees and those who have no experience.

We have a vision to hire writers, who are part of the fabric of Ireland.  Anyone is welcome to write and report for us and in return we will train them with our professional knowledge and they will help shape a fairer, more just news, a news representative of all - the poor, the young, old, those in protest, the disabled, women, entrepreneurs, all political parties, the gardai, nurses, doctors and teachers, the public and private sector, people of different sexual orientation...the list can and will go on...but we need your help to make this vision a reality.  

Make it happen, make Ireland Today a true representation of a country that is changing, a country developing economically and culturally.

We are one, we are Ireland Today.

Risks and challenges

The risks that we will undergo are mainly legal. If we write and publish news articles, we need to ensure that our news is legally-safe. The owner and the editor of the website has a lot of media law knowledge garnered from her years in newsrooms, but the website is also keen to seek a legal representative who would offer advice when needed. This is another matter we would need to gain funding for.

We would also have to ensure all our stories are accurate and fair. Again the editor and owner and the news editor are experienced journalists, who will copy check all stories to ensure they are to a high standard.

We would also ensure that people who feature in our stories are given a right to reply because we will always be contactable via email.

Deadlines will also be an issue to overcome but again, we are accustomed to working to time-demands.

We will be building a library of photographic images to accompany our stories and again, it would be extremely helpful to gain a fund to allow us to build this.

story:
PROPUESTA DE LA EDITORIAL OVEJA NEGRA

[…] Sugerimos que parte de esa edición al ser pequeña la comercializara en pequeños lanzamientos de 20 o 30 personas de diversos círculos profesionales vendiendo y firmando, y la hiciera circular repartiéndola y donándola a múltiples personas, medios, intelectuales, políticos, catedráticos, columnistas,amigos de su círculo profesional.

Dado que el libro ha sido evaluado positivamente por la Editorial, podríamos hacer la edición, corrección de erratas, diseño de edición, portadas, ISBN, código de barras, impresión.

Podemos acordar producirle a usted para sus patrocinadores 250 libros. Oveja Negra por su parte financiaría, produciría y comercializaría otros 250 ejemplares y los distribuye en el país a librerías.

La Editorial difunde su libro en la Feria del Libro de Bogotá de Abril y los difunde en su web donde también ofrecemos edición digital a los lectores.


¿POR QUÉ CROWDFOUNDING?

Por ser escritora nueva, la editorial me propuso comprometerme con la promoción y venta de 250 ejemplares, los cuales me conviene vender  antes del 10 de enero del próximo año.

Si adquieres previamente mi obra a través de esta plataforma, obtendrás una de las Recompensas. (A la derecha de la pantalla) y la invitación al lanzamiento de la novela.  

No obstante, si no puedes adquirir una recompensa, tu apoyo desde un dolar en adelante me resulta de gran valor. 

Gracias por ayudarme a hacer realidad este sueño y por tu apoyo a nuevos escritores colombianos.
story_txt:
PROPUESTA DE LA EDITORIAL OVEJA NEGRA[…] Sugerimos que parte de esa edición al ser pequeña la comercializara en pequeños lanzamientos de 20 o 30 personas de diversos círculos profesionales vendiendo y firmando, y la hiciera circular repartiéndola y donándola a múltiples personas, medios, intelectuales, políticos, catedráticos, columnistas,amigos de su círculo profesional.
Dado que el libro ha sido evaluado positivamente por la Editorial, podríamos hacer la edición, corrección de erratas, diseño de edición, portadas, ISBN, código de barras, impresión.
Podemos acordar producirle a usted para sus patrocinadores 250 libros. Oveja Negra por su parte financiaría, produciría y comercializaría otros 250 ejemplares y los distribuye en el país a librerías.
La Editorial difunde su libro en la Feria del Libro de Bogotá de Abril y los difunde en su web donde también ofrecemos edición digital a los lectores.

¿POR QUÉ CROWDFOUNDING?
Por ser escritora nueva, la editorial me propuso comprometerme
con la promoción y venta de 250 ejemplares, los cuales me conviene vender  antes del 10 de enero del próximo año.
Si adquieres previamente mi obra a través de esta
plataforma, obtendrás una de las Recompensas.
(A la derecha de la pantalla) y la invitación al lanzamiento de la novela.  
No obstante, si no puedes adquirir una recompensa, tu apoyo desde un dolar en adelante me resulta de gran valor. 
Gracias por ayudarme a hacer realidad este sueño y por tu apoyo a nuevos escritores colombianos.

story:
Who am I you may ask?

Well Liz Allen is a passionate Life Coach and Hypnotherapist.
My journey hasn't been an easy road to get where I am today. I have struggled with the pain of child sexual abuse, physical and metal abuse. I know once this book is written and released that many lives will be changed and they will grow with your help. 
I can make this a reality that will go world wide.

What We Need & What You Get

How the funds will be spent

  • Return flight to Melbourne to finish putting my book together
  • Mentoring and accountability as well as author training & support
  • Accommodation and meals
  • Professional photography
  • Everything that's needed for publication eg: editing, internal layout, library deposit, barcode 
  • Printing of 300 books and set up for Kindle uploads
  • Plus also great perks for those who donate

The Impact

After my book is published, I feel that it can and will help so many people. I want people to know that the abuse they have suffered or still suffering with, that there is a way out and it will get better and asking for help is not a bad thing nor a weakness. It can be the turning point in thier lives. If there is one thing I know, it is that we are all strong, sometimes we just need a little helping hand and some guidance to find the way and I know that through the pages of my book it can be a starting point.

It's not just about me it's about all those with challenges in life


Other Ways You Can Help

 If you are able to make a donation or even if you are unable to, please pass this information onto others who may be able to contribute. 

I believe this is about helping people open up, speak out and be heard.

Don't let FEAR or DEPRESSION, take over the life of someone that you care about. 

 PLEASE HELP TODAY. I will be deeply grateful to you all.

story:
Campaign Perks have been shipped! 

For you Bakersfield locals, I will be delivering your perks on Tuesday, December 20th 2016 if all things go as planned. 

...

Hi, internets! My name is Terry McGhee and I am dragging you here in the hopes that you will hear (read) me out and hopefully find a reason to want to contribute to this campaign!

Let’s start off with a little about me. Just imagine, it was a dark and cool February night in 1979, the Christmas decorations were all tucked away neatly in the garage except for the Donaldson's house down the street, for some reason they just didn’t care anymore. My parents stuffed themselves into my father's truck and set out for the hospital, my mother grasping tight my father's arm while muttering, “If you name him Lee, I’ll kill you!” as I began my preparations to be born into the world.


Sorry, it says a short introduction!


Ok, so let us fast forward a bit.  I am broke. Some (including myself) might say broken as well, but I am working on that. Apparently, Flex Seal can only do so much for the human mind.

Anyway, I need help publishing my fifth book Souvenir of Nowhere and building a sellers booth, but more than that, I need help in creating a social table where we can all gather and openly talk about things we have all kept quiet about for far too long, such as suicide.

 

I’ve self-published four previous books:

The Streets is a compilation of short stories that started out as a way to deal with past experiences and then turned into a sort of mix of fact and fiction that made its way to publication.

Dark Leaves was originally titled Dark Leaf Poetry, it’s a massive book of poetry that was written and compiled without much editing.

Thief of Dreams was my first actual attempt at editing and putting together a book of poetry that would showcase some of my better work.

Charades was published in 2013, which is where I started the idea of mixing poetry, stories, and journal entries into a single book.

 

Yes, this campaign is to help publish Souvenir of Nowhere, but this is really just the tip of the iceberg that I envision. I would also love to be able to begin stepping out of the dark and comforting corners of my own little world and create a presence both in the outernet as well as the internet. The goal isn’t just to publish, but to also create a reserve of 10 books each and set up shop as a real artist who has their own booth that they can throw in the truck and unfurl at local events and such. For that to happen, I‘m going to have to do some serious begging, bartering, and well, possibly certain unspeakable services that require mouthwash, like public speaking. What? Oh come on, get your mind out of the gutter!

 

If and when we reach that goal, then we will be turning towards a much bigger picture and incredibly difficult challenge that I think I am ready to take on, but I’ll need help. I want to create a safe place for those who may be struggling with suicidal thoughts and plans. I know that there are hotlines and programs already in place and I do not want to take anything away from what they do, I think it is great. I also know that I can't be the only one who felt a little untrusting of using them in moments where I really needed a shoulder to lean on. Anonymity can be a powerful tool if used correctly, the strugle will be in figuring out how to do it.

The poetry and stories aspect of Souvenir of Nowhere pretty much attract their own lovers, but the journal section of SoN is what both terrifies me as well as exhilarates.

In Charades the journal section was made up of a lot of entries regarding my mothers passing and the direct aftermath of dealing with it. Well not so much dealing with it as just surviving it.  

 

In Souvenir of Nowhere, the journal entries mostly deal with my plans to commit suicide in 2013. These are completely unedited for content (except for changing names to initials) and show a very raw and disturbing look at my own fight or lack thereof. They are not easy to read, and they were even harder to write. There are personal secrets in here that most of my family doesn’t know about. As much as I wanted to go back and edit some of it out to save face, I can’t. Not if I want this to be an honest and real starting point for the discussion I hope follows.

 

This is not a self-help book, there are no answers here. You won’t find how one person overcame his suicidal thoughts and lives happily ever after. I still struggle with it every day, but I am tired of how much of an eggshell topic it is in society. So with your help, I am hoping to create a community within our own where people can talk about their struggle, their fight, not feel ashamed or guilty about it. A place where there is safety, not just in acceptance, but in encouragement to talk about it as well.

 

So, what I have figured out is some of the starting goal details! Yes, this is where things get rather boring for some, but others are curious how much thought has been put into this campaign and I wanted to ease their mind that it wasn’t just tossed up overnight.

 

Let’s keep the fun rolling for a minute though and talk about the Perks for donating first!

 

This is concept artwork for the Limited Edition 8x2” Bookmarks, but don’t you worry, there will also be tassels!

Here are all the books that in addition to Souvenir of Nowhere, are also offered as perks!

 

Ok so let’s break down the campaign goals, shall we? This is what is needed to put together my little seller booth of awesome!

Table 72" x 30" x 29.25": $70.00

Table Cover: $20.00

Banner 6'x2': $45.00

Posters x50: $20.00

Bookmarks 2"x8" x250: $36.00

Bookmark Tassels x100: $15.00

Business Cards x250: $17.70

The Streets x10,Thief of Dreams x10, Dark Leaves x10, Charades x10, Souvenir of Nowhere x10: $254.30

First Friday Spot 12 months: $180.00 (This is a local Bakersfield Arts Council gathering that happens downtown locally on every first Friday of the month)

Total Needed:

$658.00

$731.00 w/ Crowd Funding Charge of 10%

 

So, $731 without shipping charges added. I know what you’re thinking, why the $1500 goal then?

 

The Donation Vs Cost break down is as follows:

Donation Vs Profit after Cost

$5 - $3.25

$10 - $6.00

$15 -  $7.00

$20 - $12.00

$30 - $16.00

$40 - $20.00

$50 - $24.00

$100 - $40.00

 

Basically, it boils down to needing twice as much to hit the goal, which is fine. I might be kind of shooting myself in the foot a bit because I also haven’t actually figured in shipping charges, but still, I think I am comfortable enough with the prospect of my campaign to go for it!

 

I know some of you are reading this outside of the USA and frowning a little bit but don’t be discouraged. Although I can’t technically sign and ship you copies of the perks without charging astronomical amounts for shipping, I can figure out a way to send you coupon codes for Amazon in the UK that will drop the cost of the book down to it’s bare publisher charged price with no royalties, which is somewhere around the £2.99 or €3.50 mark.

 

Well, if you are still here or already donated, I would like to thank you immensely for hearing (reading) me out. Hopefully, I can welcome you to the campaign. If you can’t donate but still want to help, use those Share options and spread the word. We only have 60 days to make this happen from the moment we go live, so feel free to click them often!

 

F.A.Q.

What is Souvenir of Nowhere?
Souvenir of Nowhere is a three part book. Poetry, Short stories (both finished and unfinished), and journal entries.

Each section is in chronological order, spanning four years (2013 to 2016). While only the Journal section uses dates, you can still feel the arc and spiral of the first two sections.

 

Why should anyone care or be interested in reading journal entries in a poetry and short story book?
Not everyone will, and that is perfectly fine. In Charades I did the same thing, including journal entries of the time after my mother passed away as well as a suicide letter written in 2007. I did so in the hopes it might help someone. Not in the sense that I have any answers what so ever, but think of it as a personal description of how one person kept their head above water when that tiny little ripple we see out in the distance comes rushing forward and turns into a towering wall of water before it reaches us.

In Souvenir of Nowhere I took it not just to a new level, but completely passed my own comfort zone with the journal entries. Most of them were written as I prepared again in 2013 to take my own life. They are both a goodbye as well as a description of the demons I fight within my own head to this day. There are no answers here, no happy ending, and no easy fix. 

My hope is that someone somewhere will read these entries and find comfort in knowing that while they may feel they fight the battle on their own, there are many of us fighting the same war under different circumstances and that they are never alone. I also want to start a conversation about suicide, one not cloaked in hushed whispers of absent promises like, “It’ll get better”, or “Cheer up” bullshit, but a real conversation where people can say, “This is my fight.” and not be judged or torn down by it, but embraced for the courage to come forward.

Anyone who has struggled with suicide knows the joke of psychiatric wards, bored doctors, and caring but scared loved ones. So let’s talk about it, no matter how terrified we all may be.

Do you have a motto you live by?
I do, and it’s pretty simple. “One more f***ing day!”

story:
Queremos eliminar las excusas.

Tras trabajar semanas tras semana con fundaciones locales, nos dimos cuenta que lamentablemente la gran masa de la sociedad es la que por más que quieran colaborar, por falta de tiempo y de recursos no lo pueden hacer. Las grandes empresas siempre reciben llamados de ayuda y muchas veces son aquellas que establecen las fundaciones y las comunidades de más bajos recursos tienden a ayudarse entre ellos... somos nosotros, la masa media, que lamentablemente no sabe como ayudar. 

Ahí entra DAR PANAMA.  Un espacio fácil y práctico donde las personas por medio de una página web muy moderna y limpia y optimizada para celular y tablet, pueden entrar y hacer click en su fundación de escogencia y donar una cantidad de dinero mensual, la que deseen, por medio de descuento directo a la tarjeta de crédito, cuenta bancaria o paypal. 

Las fundaciones y organizaciones sociales son el pulso de nuestra nación, son aquellas que tratan con los problemas más difíciles y profundos desde abusos infantiles, desnutrición, enfermedades raras, cáncer, sida, embarazos precoces hasta juventud en riesgo y mucho más. 

Ayúdanos por medio de este link a crear esta plataforma, a recaudar la información necesaria y a darle un respiro a estas fundaciones tan necesitadas de tu aporte. Dólar a Dólar haremos la diferencia.
